column4: anyone know if gnome can use .ico files instead of .png for icon themes?
I notice I can use .ico files when manually selecting an icon in nautilus, but can't get them to work as themes
i just converted a transparent one
and i looks NICE to me :-)
i guess you are asking the wrong person
don't know what dithered or gradient means :-/
i could mail both of them to you :-)
